files.name: Import images
files.description: A group to read in the folder and subfolder structure, annotate them, and import the images. The input is the top folder, the output is the imported image(s).

files.name: Split channels: three channels, R, G, B order
files.description: Split a 3-channel image into three separate grey-scale images, in the order of red, green and blue.

files.name: Basic blob finder
files.description: Segmentation of bright/on/dark circular object, e.g. blobs or nuclei. Parameters accessible include the smoothing radius of Gaussian blur, thresholding method, and particle finder ranges of size and circularity.
